description: This file defines a React-like component for the 'Create new note' page in a personal notes management frontend. It handles loading notes, creating a new note, and redirecting after save; also sets the page metadata.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the main component for the create note page.

methods.name: useNotesStore
methods.description: Hook to access notes storage state and methods.

methods.name: useTask$
methods.description: Hook to perform side effects, such as loading data when component mounts.
Wraps a function for reactive or deferred execution.

calls: upsert({ title: n.title, content: n.content, id: undefined })
